mapper.select: SELECT t3.*, t0.U_ZipCode, t0.U_WareHouseOfPort, t0.code, t0.U_BasePriceCode as priceCode, isnull(t4.U_Price,0) U_Price, a3.U_priceUDO as priceType, t5.ds_code as channel FROM dbo.[@PRICE09DETAIL] t0 left join [@PRICELIST] a2 on t0.U_BasePriceCode = a2.code left join [@pricetype] a3 on a2.U_priceType = a3.code inner JOIN dbo.tb_ds_company t3 ON t0.U_WareHouseFrom = t3.yw_code left join ( SELECT tt0.code, tt0.U_WareHouseFrom, tt0.U_WareHouseOfPort, tt1.U_Price FROM dbo.[@PRICE09TRANSFER] tt0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT code, U_WareHouseFrom, U_WareHouseOfPort, U_Price FROM dbo.[@PRICETFDETAIL] WHERE ISNULL( U_StartTime, #{effectTime} ) <= #{effectTime} AND ISNULL( U_EndTime, #{effectTime} ) >= #{effectTime} ) tt1 ON tt0.U_WareHouseOfPort = tt1.U_WareHouseOfPort AND tt0.U_WareHouseFrom = tt1.U_WareHouseFrom AND tt0.U_TransferPrice = tt1.code WHERE ISNULL( tt0.U_StartDate, #{effectTime} ) <= #{effectTime} AND ISNULL( tt0.U_EndDate, #{effectTime} ) >= #{effectTime} ) t4 ON t0.U_WareHouseFrom = t4.U_WareHouseFrom AND t0.U_WareHouseOfPort = t4.U_WareHouseOfPort AND t0.code = t4.code left join [tb_ds_channel] t5 on t5.yw_code = #{productCode} WHERE t0.code = ( SELECT DISTINCT U_PortPrice FROM dbo.[@PRICEROUTING] WHERE ISNULL( U_StartDate, #{effectTime} ) <= #{effectTime} AND ISNULL( U_EndDate, #{effectTime} ) >= #{effectTime} AND U_ProductCode = #{productCode} ) AND ISNULL( t0.U_StartTime, #{effectTime} ) <= #{effectTime} AND ISNULL( t0.U_EndTime, #{effectTime} ) >= #{effectTime} ORDER BY t3.company_code ASC
select yw_code as productCode,name as productName from dbo.tb_ds_channel
